semantic: The color palette is a collection of global tokens which are immanent throughout the rest of the application. The palette helps outline the semantic use of color in the design system.

shadow.semantic: shadow rgba value used for all semi-transparent shadow elements such as modal background overlays

primary.semantic: default primary color. Used for buttons, accent styling etc

success.semantic: this color is used for positive actions or to show success state

danger.semantic: this color is used for negative actions (such as delete etc) or to show failure/error state

warning.semantic: this color is used to show a warning state

info.semantic: used for information banners, and hyperlinks
